lyric:
[00:00.000] 作曲 : Amanda Ava Koci/Henry Walter/Nadir Khayat/Jakke Erixson/Mimoza Blinsson/Hillary Bernstein/Madison Love/Brett McLaughlin/Desmond Child/Ari Leff/Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Derrick Millano/Saweetie
[00:00.196] 作词 : Amanda Ava Koci/Henry Walter/Nadir Khayat/Jakke Erixson/Mimoza Blinsson/Hillary Bernstein/Madison Love/Brett McLaughlin/Desmond Child/Ari Leff/Jacob Kasher Hindlin/Derrick Millano/Saweetie
[00:00.588]If all of the kings had their queens on the throne
[00:04.036]We would pop champagne and raise a toast (Saweetie)
[00:08.190]To all of the queens who are fighting alone (Ava)
[00:11.403]Baby, you're not dancing on your own (Yeah, Lauv, let's go)
[00:14.956]Can't live without me, you wanna, but you can't, nah-nah-nah
[00:18.743]Think it's funny, but honey, can't run this show on your own
[00:22.844]I can feel my body shake, there's only so much I can take
[00:26.502]I'll show you how a real queen behaves (Oh, oh-oh)
[00:30.969]No damsel in distress, don't need to save me (Save me)
[00:34.704]Once I start breathing fire, you can't tame me (Tame me)
[00:38.440]And you might think I'm weak without a sword
[00:42.071]But if I had one, it'd be bigger than yours
[00:45.127]If all of the kings had their queens on the throne
[00:48.288]We would pop champagne and raise a toast
[00:52.258]To all of the queens who are fighting alone (Uh)
[00:55.654]Baby, you're not dancing on your own (Yeah, yeah, yeah)
[00:59.390]She's the queen and I'm just lucky to get close to the throne
[01:03.178]I'm not worthy, I'm not worthy, but she's taking me home, yeah (Oh)
[01:08.036]No damsel in distress, don't need to save her
[01:11.458]She's a goddess, I will never try to change her
[01:15.481]She know she got my world inside of her palm
[01:19.191]But she can have whatever she wants
[01:22.090]If all of the kings had their queens on the throne (Yeah, baby)
[01:25.225]We would pop champagne and raise a toast (Ooh, ooh, yeah)
[01:29.300]To all of the queens who are fighting alone (Fighting alone)
[01:32.591]Baby, you're not dancing on your own (Woo)
[01:36.693]
[01:49.179]Let's go
[01:51.896] I'm a queen, I'm a boss, I'm a brat (Yeah)
[01:53.333] Hella independent, I get this, I get that (Uh-uh)
[01:55.109]Shout out to the girls from the 'burb to the trap
[01:57.042]I don't need a man for shit, put myself on the map (Oh)
[01:59.707]And they thought I was done
[02:00.569] I ain't even hit my peak and I'm still on the run
[02:02.449]I'm like Lolo on the laps how I'm runnin' the track
[02:04.356] Only time I see a L's on the luxury tax
[02:07.151]And my whole team winning
[02:08.013]Post a pic just because, they like, "Oh, she chilling" (Yeah)
[02:10.025]Million-dollar deals and my lipstick seal it
[02:11.697]I need acrylic nails, I don't need no critics (Facts)
[02:13.578]Saweetie gon' glow, Saweetie gon' shine (Yeah)
[02:15.484]Take off for the tens, I don't see no nines
[02:17.339]My name on they lips, my name on they minds
[02:19.089]How I take it from the block to the Hollywood sign
[02:21.153]If all of the kings had their queens on the throne
[02:24.236]We would pop champagne and raise a toast
[02:28.337]To all of the queens who are fighting alone
[02:31.654]Baby, you're not dancing on your own
[02:35.834]Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh
[02:43.227]Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh, oh-oh
tlyric:
[00:00.588]倘若所有的国王都让皇后坐上宝座
[00:04.036]我们都将开香槟欢庆
[00:08.190]向所有独立斗争的女皇们敬酒
[00:11.403]亲爱的 你并非独自翩翩起舞
[00:14.956]无法过着没有我的生活 你只想要我 但是你并不能如愿以偿
[00:18.743]你认为这风趣十足 但是亲爱的 你无法独自完成演出
[00:22.844]我能感受到自己的身体在颤动 我只能够承受如此之多的重负
[00:26.502]我将让你看看真正的女皇该如何表现
[00:30.969]我可并非满心忧愁 无需救赎
[00:34.704]一旦我煽风点火 谁也无法将我驯服
[00:38.440]或许你认为我白手起家 无拼搏利器
[00:42.071]倘若我有武器反击 那定会比你的更加坚韧
[00:45.127]倘若所有的国王都让皇后坐上宝座
[00:48.288]我们都将开香槟欢庆
[00:52.258]向所有独立斗争的女皇们敬酒
[00:55.654]亲爱的 你并非独自翩翩起舞
[00:59.390]她便是女皇 我只不过如此幸运可以走进她的宝座之下
[01:03.178]我一点都不配可她还是要带我回家
[01:08.036]她可并非满心忧愁 无需救赎
[01:11.458]她是高贵的女神 我永不会去尝试改变她
[01:15.481]她知道她可轻易将我的全世界掌握于股掌
[01:19.191]但她想要 也定可得到
[01:22.090]倘若所有的国王都让皇后坐上宝座
[01:25.225]我们向所有独立斗争的女皇们敬酒都将开香槟欢庆
[01:29.300]向所有独立斗争的女皇们敬酒
[01:32.591]亲爱的 你并非独自翩翩起舞
[01:36.693]
[01:49.179]出发吧
[01:51.896]我就是女皇 我就背后的大人物 我就是这么个难缠的“小混蛋”
[01:53.333]特立独行的女王 我应有尽有
[01:55.109]对那些因拜金而落入陷阱的女孩们大喊
[01:57.042]我不需要男人便能自成一派 我的未来蓝图有自己绘制
[01:59.707]他们认为我已了结完蛋的时候
[02:00.569]事实告诉他们 我并未结束追逐着前方 我还没攀上属于自己的巅峰
[02:02.449]人生轨道上 我就是奔跑能手
[02:04.356]唯独我看见奢侈税栏的名牌
[02:07.151]当我全队凯旋而归
[02:08.013]自拍发出只不过是因为他们会为我而惊呼
[02:10.025]百万交易的机密文件 由我红唇为其密封
[02:11.697]我欲装点满水晶指甲 我也不接受任何外界批评
[02:13.578]我独自闪耀熠熠光彩
[02:15.484]高位起航 我从不往下看 也不会走下坡路
[02:17.339]我的名字是人们日常谈论的热门话题 并深深映入他们的脑海之中
[02:19.089]我来告诉你们我是如何将其从大街小巷传遍至好莱坞标志
[02:21.153]倘若所有的国王都让皇后坐上宝座
[02:24.236]我们向所有独立斗争的女皇们敬酒都将开香槟欢庆
